title: Football Players In Sayreville, N.J., Charged With Sexual Assault
teaser: Seven football players at Sayreville War Memorial High School have been charged with aggravated criminal sexual contact with younger players. While the charges work their way through the legal system, school Superintendent Richard Labbe has cancelled the remaining football games for freshmen, JV and varsity teams.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
